tags.usage:
`{%}tags` - Lists the existing tags
`{%}tags <tag_name>` - Sends the tag message
`{%}tags add <tag_name> <tag_message>` - Adds a tag to the guild
`{%}tags edit <tag_name> <tag_message>` - Edits an already existing tag
`{%}tags remove <tag_name>` - Removes a tag from the guild
